7163.quoteText:
We are based in the United States.
The Services are controlled and operated by us from the United States and are not intended to subject us to the laws or jurisdiction of any state, country or territory other than that of the United States.
7163.title: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country

tosdr.case: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country

7164.quoteText: Your Personal Information may be stored and processed in any country where we have facilities or in which we engage service providers, and by using the Services you consent to the transfer of information to countries outside of your country of residence, including the United States, which may have data protection rules that are different from those of your country.
7164.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

7166.quoteText: To provide you with promotional and marketing communications. We use Personal Information to send you information about our products and services, as well as updates about our business, where you opt-in to such communications. To opt-out, please see the “Managing Your Information” section, below.
7166.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

7167.quoteText:
In particular, we use Google Analytics – for information on how Google Analytics collects and processes data, please click here.

If you would prefer not to accept cookies, please see “Managing Your Information,” below.
7167.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

7168.quoteText: Please note that doing so may negatively impact your experience using the Site or Service, as some features may not work properly.
7168.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
